byline.contributor: Souad Mekhennet contributed reporting from Frankfurt.

snippet: The Obama administration is pursuing seemingly contradictory policies in Afghanistan and Pakistan as it struggles to end the conflict in Afghanistan and salvage a security relationship with Pakistan.
